connections.name: Texas Instruments XDS110 USB Debug Probe

debuggerSettings.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
<PropertyValues>

  <property id="RestartOnSymbolLoad">
    <curValue>1</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="VerifyAfterProgramLoad">
    <curValue>Full verification</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="AutoResetOnConnect">
    <curValue>1</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="FlashFiles">
    <curValue></curValue>
  </property>

</PropertyValues>

connections.name: Texas Instruments XDS110 USB Debug Probe
Texas Instruments XDS110 USB Debug Probe

debuggerSettings.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
<PropertyValues>

  <property id="MPUEnabled">
    <curValue>1</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="FlashResetType">
    <curValue>Soft reset</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="FlashVerification">
    <curValue>0</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="EnableWaitForDebug">
    <curValue>0</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="EraseECCSRAM">
    <curValue>1</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="FlashSkipDeviceID">
    <curValue>1</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="FlashVerboseMode">
    <curValue>1</curValue>
  </property>

</PropertyValues>
